name: Ice I
core: The first stilling suggests the matter benefits from pause, structure, and clear limits.
shadow: Restraint becomes inhibition when motion is refused before the situation is understood.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a measured first move can still emerge from restraint.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports pausing before committing force.

name: Ice II
core: A careful pairing suggests stability can be built through mutual limits and disciplined exchange.
shadow: Balance becomes cold distance when restraint replaces contact entirely.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward orderly cooperation.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests setting terms before deepening commitment.

name: Ice III
core: Refinement suggests the work improves when excess is pared away and the form made cleaner.
shadow: Refinement becomes sterility when all warmth is removed from the process.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates precision can serve progress if it stays humane.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports reduction, editing, and careful compression.

name: Ice IV
core: Containment suggests that preserving order is more useful than expanding your reach.
shadow: Containment becomes rigidity when structure is defended long after it ceases to serve.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward using structure as a base for careful action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports consolidation and boundary keeping.

name: Ice V
core: Loss of coherence suggests a cold fracture has already formed and should be addressed directly.
shadow: Fracture deepens when detachment is used to deny the damage.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates repair begins with exact acknowledgment.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports stopping further strain before attempting repair.

name: Ice VI
core: A stable exchange suggests equilibrium can be restored through fairness and disciplined reciprocity.
shadow: Fairness becomes accounting without care when the measure matters more than the people involved.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward practical restitution and even-handed action.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests slowing the exchange until balance is real.

name: Ice VII
core: Disciplined testing suggests the field can be surveyed without abandoning strategic position.
shadow: Calculation becomes suspicion when every movement is treated as a threat.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates a careful advance can be made from a defended position.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports holding the line while the pattern clarifies.

name: Ice VIII
core: A clean release suggests that swift separation may be kinder than prolonged strain.
shadow: Separation becomes abandonment when speed is used to avoid accountability.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward decisive severance where needed.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests confirming what truly must be cut away.

name: Ice IX
core: Hard-won clarity suggests endurance is possible when the form of the burden is properly understood.
shadow: Endurance becomes numbness when feeling is frozen out in order to continue.
astralNote: Its astral note indicates resilience can support one more necessary effort.
umbralNote: Its umbral note suggests preserving strength through careful pacing.

name: Ice X
core: Final stillness suggests the cycle can close if what is finished is allowed to rest completely.
shadow: Closure becomes deadlock when finality is claimed too early or too absolutely.
astralNote: Its astral note points toward completing the pattern with exactness.
umbralNote: Its umbral note supports closure, rest, and deliberate cessation.
